title: Soil Salinity EC Converter – dS/m, µS/cm, ppm & Salinity Classes

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Key equivalences used in this calculator 1 dS/m = 1 mS/cm = 1 mmho/cm 1 dS/m = 1000 µS/cm 1 dS/m = 0.1 S/m General conversion relationships \(\text{dS/m} = \dfrac{\mu\text{S/cm}}{1000}\) \(\mu\text{S/cm} = \text{dS/m} \times 1000\) \(\text{S/m} = \text{dS/m} \times 0.1\)
